about_the_game:
Thistlemine is a captivating new puzzle RPG by Thistlebro.

Only madness and corruption await...

Every battle against the Anomalis is a unique test of wit and will. Struggle through countless perils and solve cryptic riddles to reach the heart of the Exclusion Zone.

Limited Time Tokyo Game Show 2022 demo. Available to play until October 2.

name: Thistlemine Demo
